title: kereya neeranu (geetham)
sahitya:
hariya karuNadoLaada bhaagyava



hari samaarpaNemaaDi badukiro







caraNam 1







kereya neeranu kerege calli



varava paDedava rante kaaNirO



(hariya)







caraNam 2







shree purandara viTThala raaya



caraNa kamalavanambi badukiro



(hariya)
